bach_open_taxonomy.SeriesGlobalContexts¶

class bach_open_taxonomy.SeriesGlobalContexts(engine, base_node, index, name, expression, group_by, sorted_ascending, index_sorting)[source]¶

Objectiv Global Contexts series. This series type contains functionality specific to the Objectiv Global Contexts.

Attributes

gc

Accessor for Objectiv global context data.

global_contexts

Accessor for Objectiv global context data.

obj

Accessor for Objectiv stack data.

objectiv

Accessor for Objectiv stack data.
